verses.verse: And I turned<WH7725>, and lifted up<WH5375> my eyes<WH5869>, and looked<WH7200>, and<WH3318>, behold, there came four<WH702> chariots<WH4818> out<WH3318> from between two<WH8147> mountains<WH2022>; and the mountains<WH2022> were mountains<WH2022> of brass<WH5178>.
In the first<WH7223> chariot<WH4818> were red<WH122> horses<WH5483>; and in the second<WH8145> chariot<WH4818> black<WH7838> horses<WH5483>;
And in the third<WH7992> chariot<WH4818> white<WH3836> horses<WH5483>; and in the fourth<WH7243> chariot<WH4818> grizzled<WH1261> and bay<WH554> horses<WH5483>.
Then I answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> unto the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me<WH113>, What are these, my lord?

And the angel<WH4397> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> unto me<WH702>, These are the four spirits<WH7307> of the heavens<WH8064>, which go forth<WH3318> from standing<WH3320> before the Lord<WH113> of all the earth<WH776>.

The black<WH7838> horses<WH5483> which are in it go forth<WH3318> into the north<WH6828> country<WH776>; and the white<WH3836> go forth<WH3318> after<WH310> them<WH1261>; and the grizzled go forth<WH3318> toward the south<WH8486> country<WH776>.

And the bay<WH554> went forth<WH3318>, and sought<WH1245> to go<WH3212> that they might walk to and forth<WH1980> through the earth<WH776>: and he said<WH559>, Get you here<WH3212>, walk to and forth<WH1980> through the earth<WH776>. So they walked to and forth<WH1980> through the earth<WH776>.

Then cried<WH2199> he upon<WH853> me<WH1696>, and spoke unto me<WH559>, saying, Behold<WH7200>, these that go<WH3318> toward the north<WH6828> country<WH776> have quieted<WH5117> my spirit<WH7307> in the north<WH6828> country<WH776>.
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Take<WH3947> of them of the captivity<WH1473>, even of Heldai<WH2469>, of Tobijah<WH2900>, and of Jedaiah<WH3048>, which are come<WH935> from Babylon<WH894>, and come<WH935> you the same day<WH3117>, and go<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of Josiah<WH2977> the son<WH1121> of Zephaniah<WH6846>;

Then take<WH3947> silver<WH3701> and gold<WH2091>, and make<WH6213> crowns<WH5850>, and set<WH7760> them upon the head<WH7218> of Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Josedech<WH3087>, the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548>;

And speak<WH559> unto him<WH559>, saying, Thus speaks<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, saying<WH559>, Behold the man<WH376> whose name<WH8034> is The BRANCH<WH6780>; and he shall grow up<WH6779> out of his place<WH1129>, and he shall build the temple<WH1964> of the Lord<WH3068>:

Even he shall build<WH1129> the temple<WH1964> of the Lord<WH3068>; and he shall bear<WH5375> the glory<WH1935>, and shall sit<WH3427> and rule<WH4910> upon his throne<WH3678>; and he shall be a priest<WH3548> upon his throne<WH3678>: and the counsel<WH6098> of peace<WH7965> shall be between them both<WH8147>.

And the crowns<WH5850> shall be to Helem<WH2494>, and to Tobijah<WH2900>, and to Jedaiah<WH3048>, and to Hen<WH2581> the son<WH1121> of Zephaniah<WH6846>, for a memorial<WH2146> in the temple<WH1964> of the Lord<WH3068>.

And they that are far off<WH7350> shall come<WH935> and build<WH1129> in the temple<WH1964> of the Lord<WH3068>, and you shall know<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> has sent<WH7971> me unto you<WH8085>. And this shall come to pass, if you will diligently obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
